text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: ブラウザやスマホアプリから利用

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: [ブラウザ上で動作するフロントエンド]

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: [ネイティブアプリケーション]

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: [ルーティング、認証、レート制限]

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: [ビジネスロジックを提供するコアAPI]

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: [非同期ジョブ、バッチ処理を実行]

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: [ユーザー情報、トランザクションデータの保存]

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: セッション、頻出データのキャッシュ
